title: The Mercedes Vision EQXX brings us closer to 1000km-range EVs
content:
In January, Mercedes unveiled its Vision EQXX concept EV, touting it as “the most efficient Mercedes-Benz ever built” — able to deliver a whopping 1,000 km (621 miles) range on a single charge. And as it turns out, the company held true to its word. Today, the German brand announced that its concept car successfully completed a long-range test of 1,008km (626 miles) in real-world conditions. The Vision EQXX is a sleek-looking machine. Credit: Mercedes-Benz The EV traveled across various European cities, starting in Germany, then on to Italy and Switzerland, before arriving at its final destination, the town port…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: The Mercedes Vision EQXX concept EV traveled 1,000km across Europe on a single charge.
